title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2018 World Crypto Con Pumpkin 0.01BTC, silver 1/2oz x3https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1C3Ekx8Pbya6JNSTVAmECfQGMhbut6HdDh.htmhttps://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1E4YM2ru7mpYC3kw7ySLtx58oHHuyVgozA.htmhttps://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1N7yGtLisXroQ67zEvVyS1GDKooRTEVygk.htm*Will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions. Please bid on the number of coins and then the amount per coin: 1 @ xxBTC, 2 @ xxBTC, 3 @ xxBTCLOT 2: 2017 HODL #041 0.01BTC, silver 1/2ozhttps://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1hJqHnopi3so6uyFDW22kMXiWn6FWDDoJ.htmLOT 3: 2017 BearWhale #016 0.03BTC, silver 1ozhttps://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1FssRY4WCAEPd9yT6oSPSpMUbDhvUH2cmE.htmSTARTING BID PER COIN LOT 1 and LOT 2: 0.0100BTCSTARTING BID LOT 3: 0.0300BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 15th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: September 13, 2022, 05:37:46 PMLast edit: September 19, 2022, 01:15:45 PM by minerjones
comments.body: A few people have asked for better pictures of the coins. I realized they had the capsules still on when I took the front shots, making it appear that some of them had scratches/debris.Below are new, non-capsuled front pictures Hope this helps make more informed bids.
